title: Social isolation and loneliness: modern pandemic of a psychosocial determinant of health
details: MH Hall, Y Xiao, D Öngür, J Torous, DV Jeste - Psychiatric Annals, 2024
abstract: Social connectedness is a fundamental aspect of human nature. Over the last two decades, there has been a behavioral pandemic of social isolation and loneliness globally. Social isolation and loneliness affect people of all ages and constitute an …
